com.sponsorpay.publisher

Class SponsorPayPublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sponsorpay.publisher.SponsorPayPublisher

  • public class SponsorPayPublisher
extends Object
    Provides convenience calls to load and show the mobile Offer Wall, mobile BrandEnagge and the mobile Interstitial.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SponsorPayPublisher.UIStringIdentifier
      Enumeration identifying the different messages which can be displayed in the user interface.

      • getIntentForOfferWallActivity

        public static Intent getIntentForOfferWallActivity(Context context,
                                   Boolean shouldStayOpen)

        Returns an Intent that can be used to launch the SPOfferWallActivity. Lets the caller specify the behavior of the Offer Wall once the user gets redirected out of the application by clicking on an offer.

        Will use the publisher application id and user id stored in the current credentials.

        Parameters:
        context - The publisher application context.
        shouldStayOpen - True if the Offer Wall should stay open after the user clicks on an offer and gets redirected out of the app. False to close the Offer Wall.
        Returns:
        An Android Intent which can be used with the Activity method startActivityForResult() to launch the SPOfferWallActivity.Or null if the device is not supported(Running Android OS version prior to Android 2.3 (Gingerbread).

      • getIntentForOfferWallActivity

        public static Intent getIntentForOfferWallActivity(Context context,
                                   Boolean shouldStayOpen,
                                   String placementId)

        Returns an Intent that can be used to launch the SPOfferWallActivity. Lets the caller specify the behavior of the Offer Wall once the user gets redirected out of the application by clicking on an offer.

        Will use the publisher application id and user id stored in the current credentials.

        Parameters:
        context - The publisher application context.
        shouldStayOpen - True if the Offer Wall should stay open after the user clicks on an offer and gets redirected out of the app. False to close the Offer Wall.
        placementId - The placement ID.
        Returns:
        An Android Intent which can be used with the Activity method startActivityForResult() to launch the SPOfferWallActivity.Or null if the device is not supported(Running Android OS version prior to Android 2.3 (Gingerbread).

      • getIntentForOfferWallActivity

        public static Intent getIntentForOfferWallActivity(Context context,
                                   Boolean shouldStayOpen,
                                   String currencyName,
                                   HashMap<String,String> customParams)

        Returns an Intent that can be used to launch the SPOfferWallActivity. Lets the caller specify the behavior of the Offer Wall once the user gets redirected out of the application by clicking on an offer.

        Will use the publisher application id and user id stored in the current credentials.

        Parameters:
        context - The publisher application context.
        shouldStayOpen - True if the Offer Wall should stay open after the user clicks on an offer and gets redirected out of the app. False to close the Offer Wall.
        currencyName - The name of the currency employed by your application. Provide null if you don't use a custom currency name.
        customParams - A map of extra key/value pairs to add to the request URL.
        Returns:
        An Android Intent which can be used with the Activity method startActivityForResult() to launch the SPOfferWallActivity. Or null if the device is not supported(Running Android OS version prior to Android 2.3 (Gingerbread).

      • getIntentForOfferWallActivity

        public static Intent getIntentForOfferWallActivity(Context context,
                                   Boolean shouldStayOpen,
                                   String currencyName,
                                   HashMap<String,String> customParams,
                                   String placementId)

        Returns an Intent that can be used to launch the SPOfferWallActivity. Lets the caller specify the behavior of the Offer Wall once the user gets redirected out of the application by clicking on an offer.

        Will use the publisher application id and user id stored in the current credentials.

        Parameters:
        context - The publisher application context.
        shouldStayOpen - True if the Offer Wall should stay open after the user clicks on an offer and gets redirected out of the app. False to close the Offer Wall.
        currencyName - The name of the currency employed by your application. Provide null if you don't use a custom currency name.
        customParams - A map of extra key/value pairs to add to the request URL.
        placementId - The placement ID.
        Returns:
        An Android Intent which can be used with the Activity method startActivityForResult() to launch the SPOfferWallActivity. Or null if the device is not supported(Running Android OS version prior to Android 2.3 (Gingerbread).

      • getIntentForOfferWallActivity

        public static Intent getIntentForOfferWallActivity(String credentialsToken,
                                   Context context,
                                   Boolean shouldStayOpen,
                                   String currencyName,
                                   HashMap<String,String> customParams)

        Returns an Intent that can be used to launch the SPOfferWallActivity. Lets the caller specify the behavior of the Offer Wall once the user gets redirected out of the application by clicking on an offer.

        Will use the provided publisher application id and user id stored in the credentials identified by the token id.

        Parameters:
        credentialsToken - The token id of the credentials to be used.
        context - The publisher application context.
        shouldStayOpen - True if the Offer Wall should stay open after the user clicks on an offer and gets redirected out of the app. False to close the Offer Wall.
        currencyName - The name of the currency employed by your application. Provide null if you don't use a custom currency name.
        customParams - A map of extra key/value pairs to add to the request URL.
        Returns:
        An Android Intent which can be used with the Activity method startActivityForResult() to launch the SPOfferWallActivity.

      • getIntentForOfferWallActivity

        public static Intent getIntentForOfferWallActivity(String credentialsToken,
                                   Context context,
                                   Boolean shouldStayOpen,
                                   String currencyName,
                                   HashMap<String,String> customParams,
                                   String placementId)

        Returns an Intent that can be used to launch the SPOfferWallActivity. Lets the caller specify the behavior of the Offer Wall once the user gets redirected out of the application by clicking on an offer.

        Will use the provided publisher application id and user id stored in the credentials identified by the token id.

        Parameters:
        credentialsToken - The token id of the credentials to be used.
        context - The publisher application context.
        shouldStayOpen - True if the Offer Wall should stay open after the user clicks on an offer and gets redirected out of the app. False to close the Offer Wall.
        currencyName - The name of the currency employed by your application. Provide null if you don't use a custom currency name.
        customParams - A map of extra key/value pairs to add to the request URL.
        placementId - The placement ID.
        Returns:
        An Android Intent which can be used with the Activity method startActivityForResult() to launch the SPOfferWallActivity.

      • requestNewCoins

        public static void requestNewCoins(Context context,
                   SPCurrencyServerListener listener)
        Sends a request to the SponsorPay currency server to obtain the variation in amount of virtual currency for a given user. Returns immediately, and the answer is delivered to one of the provided listener's callback methods. See SPCurrencyServerListener. The current credentials will be used to get the application id and user id.
        Parameters:
        context - Android application context.
        listener - SPCurrencyServerListener which will be notified of the result of the request.

      • requestNewCoins

        public static void requestNewCoins(Context context,
                   String currencyId,
                   SPCurrencyServerListener listener)
        Sends a request to the SponsorPay currency server to obtain the variation in amount of virtual currency for a given user. Returns immediately, and the answer is delivered to one of the provided listener's callback methods. See SPCurrencyServerListener. The current credentials will be used to get the application id and user id.
        Parameters:
        context - Android application context.
        currencyId - Optionally, provide the ID of the currency that you want to retrieve. If the provided ID is empty or null, then the default currency will be requested. If an invalid currency ID will be provided then you will receive an invalid application error.
        listener - SPCurrencyServerListener which will be notified of the result of the request.

      • requestNewCoins

        public static void requestNewCoins(Context context,
                   SPCurrencyServerListener listener,
                   String customCurrency)
        Sends a request to the SponsorPay currency server to obtain the variation in amount of virtual currency for a given user. Returns immediately, and the answer is delivered to one of the provided listener's callback methods. See SPCurrencyServerListener. The current credentials will be used to get the application id and user id.
        Parameters:
        context - Android application context.
        listener - SPCurrencyServerListener which will be notified of the result of the request.
        customCurrency - A string representing the custom currency to be used by the toast message to show the amount of coins earned.

      • requestNewCoins

        public static void requestNewCoins(Context context,
                   String currencyId,
                   SPCurrencyServerListener listener,
                   String customCurrency)
        Sends a request to the SponsorPay currency server to obtain the variation in amount of virtual currency for a given user. Returns immediately, and the answer is delivered to one of the provided listener's callback methods. See SPCurrencyServerListener. The current credentials will be used to get the application id and user id.
        Parameters:
        context - Android application context.
        listener - SPCurrencyServerListener which will be notified of the result of the request.
        currencyId - Optionally, provide the ID of the currency that you want to retrieve. If the provided ID is empty or null, then the default currency will be requested. If an invalid currency ID will be provided then you will receive an invalid application error.
        customCurrency - A string representing the custom currency to be used by the toast message to show the amount of coins earned.

      • requestNewCoins

        public static void requestNewCoins(String credentialsToken,
                   Context context,
                   SPCurrencyServerListener listener,
                   String transactionId,
                   Map<String,String> customParams,
                   String customCurrency)
        Sends a request to the SponsorPay currency server to obtain the variation in amount of virtual currency for a given user. Returns immediately, and the answer is delivered to one of the provided listener's callback methods. See SPCurrencyServerListener. It will use the credentials identified by the provided token id.
        Parameters:
        credentialsToken - The token id of the credentials to be used.
        context - Android application context.
        listener - SPCurrencyServerListener which will be notified of the result of the request.
        transactionId - Optionally, provide the ID of the latest known transaction. The delta of coins will be calculated from this transaction (not included) up to the present. Leave it to null to let the SDK use the latest transaction ID it kept track of.
        customParams - A map of extra key/value pairs to add to the request URL.
        customCurrency - A string representing the custom currency to be used by the toast message to show the amount of coins earned.

      • requestNewCoins

        public static void requestNewCoins(String credentialsToken,
                   Context context,
                   SPCurrencyServerListener listener,
                   String transactionId,
                   String currencyId,
                   Map<String,String> customParams,
                   String customCurrency)
        Sends a request to the SponsorPay currency server to obtain the variation in amount of virtual currency for a given user. Returns immediately, and the answer is delivered to one of the provided listener's callback methods. See SPCurrencyServerListener. It will use the credentials identified by the provided token id.
        Parameters:
        credentialsToken - The token id of the credentials to be used.
        context - Android application context.
        listener - SPCurrencyServerListener which will be notified of the result of the request.
        transactionId - Optionally, provide the ID of the latest known transaction. The delta of coins will be calculated from this transaction (not included) up to the present. Leave it to null to let the SDK use the latest transaction ID it kept track of.
        currencyId - Optionally, provide the ID of the currency that you want to retrieve. If the provided ID is empty or null, then the default currency will be requested. If an invalid currency ID will be provided then you will receive an invalid application error.
        customParams - A map of extra key/value pairs to add to the request URL.
        customCurrency - A string representing the custom currency to be used by the toast message to show the amount of coins earned.

      • displayNotificationForSuccessfullCoinRequest

        public static void displayNotificationForSuccessfullCoinRequest(boolean shouldShowNotification)
        Allows the configuration of the Toast notification message that display the amount of coins earned after a successful request to the SponsorPay's Currency server. This is ON by default.
        Parameters:
        shouldShowNotification - Whether the Toast notification message should be shown or not

      • getIntentForMBEActivity

        public static boolean getIntentForMBEActivity(Activity activity,
                              SPBrandEngageRequestListener listener)
        Requests a Mobile BrandEngage Offer to the SponsorPay servers and registers a listener which will be notified when a response is received.
        Parameters:
        activity - Calling activity.
        listener - SPBrandEngageRequestListener which will be notified of the results of the request.
        Returns:
        A boolean that indicates if the actual request has been made to the server.

      • getIntentForMBEActivity

        public static boolean getIntentForMBEActivity(Activity activity,
                              SPBrandEngageRequestListener listener,
                              String placementId)
        Requests a Mobile BrandEngage Offer to the SponsorPay servers and registers a listener which will be notified when a response is received.
        Parameters:
        activity - Calling activity.
        listener - SPBrandEngageRequestListener which will be notified of the results of the request.
        currencyId - The custom currency ID. If the default is required then pass null.
        placementId - The placement ID.
        Returns:
        A boolean that indicates if the actual request has been made to the server.

      • getIntentForMBEActivity

        public static boolean getIntentForMBEActivity(Activity activity,
                              SPBrandEngageRequestListener listener,
                              SPCurrencyServerListener vcsListener)
        Requests a Mobile BrandEngage Offer to the SponsorPay servers and registers a listener which will be notified when a response is received.
        Parameters:
        activity - Calling activity.
        listener - SPBrandEngageRequestListener which will be notified of the results of the request.
        vcsListener - The Virtual Currency Server listener that will be notified after a successful engagement.
        Returns:
        A boolean that indicates if the actual request has been made to the server.

                              Activity activity,
                              SPBrandEngageRequestListener listener,

                              SPCurrencyServerListener vcsListener)

        Requests an Interstitial Ad to the SponsorPay servers and registers a listener which will be notified when a response is received.
        Parameters:
        credentialsToken - The token id of the credentials to be used.
        activity - Calling activity.
        listener - SPInterstitialRequestListener which will be notified of the results of the request.
        Returns:
        A boolean that indicates if the actual request has been made to the server.

      • getIntentForInterstitialActivity

        public static boolean getIntentForInterstitialActivity(String credentialsToken,
                                       Activity activity,
                                       SPInterstitialRequestListener listener,
                                       Map<String,String> parameters)
        Requests an Interstitial Ad to the SponsorPay servers and registers a listener which will be notified when a response is received.
        Parameters:
        credentialsToken - The token id of the credentials to be used.
        activity - Calling activity.
        listener - SPInterstitialRequestListener which will be notified of the results of the request.
        parameters - A map of extra key/value pairs to add to the request URL.
        placementId - The placement ID.
        Returns:
        A boolean that indicates if the actual request has been made to the server.

      • getIntentForInterstitialActivity

        public static boolean getIntentForInterstitialActivity(String credentialsToken,
                                       Activity activity,
                                       SPInterstitialRequestListener listener,
                                       Map<String,String> parameters,
                                       String placementId)
        Requests an Interstitial Ad to the SponsorPay servers and registers a listener which will be notified when a response is received.

        activity - Calling activity.
        listener - SPInterstitialRequestListener which will be notified of the results of the request.
        parameters - A map of extra key/value pairs to add to the request URL.
        placementId - The placement ID.
        Returns:
        A boolean that indicates if the actual request has been made to the server.
